newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Netscape may miss Q1 EPS.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Netscape may miss Q1 EPS.

text.p: -- Morgan Stanley analyst Mary Meeker said there is a 50 percent chance that Netscape Communications Corp may miss first quarter earnings estimates by $0.01-$0.02 per share, according to market sources.
-- Meeker estimated earnings of $0.08 per share, according to the sources, while the First Call consensus is $0.09.
-- Meeker said it would not be an easy quarter, due in part to product transitions, the sources said.
-- Meeker, however, remained optimistic about the long-term outlook, and kept the stock rated strong buy, the sources said.
